nodes.documentation:
@title IMoneyMarketAdapter
@dev Interface used by `MetaMoneyMarket` to interact with its underlying money markets.
nodes.name: IMoneyMarketAdapter

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the interest rate per block for the given token.
nodes.name: getRate

nodes.documentation: @dev Deposits the given amount of tokens in the underlying money market.
nodes.name: deposit

nodes.documentation: @dev Withdraws the given amount of tokens from the underlying money market and transfers them to `recipient`.
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation: @dev Withdraws all the tokens from the underlying money market and transfers them to `recipient`.
nodes.name: withdrawAll

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the supply for the given token, including accrued interest. This function can have side effects.
nodes.name: getSupply

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the supply for the given token; it might not include accrued interest. This function *cannot* have side effects.
nodes.name: getSupplyView

nodes.documentation: @dev Indicates if the adapter supports the token with the given address.
nodes.name: supportsToken

nodes.documentation:
@title IMoneyMarketAdapter
@dev Interface used by `MetaMoneyMarket` to interact with its underlying money markets.
nodes.name: IMoneyMarketAdapter

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the interest rate per block for the given token.
nodes.name: getRate

nodes.documentation: @dev Deposits the given amount of tokens in the underlying money market.
nodes.name: deposit

nodes.documentation: @dev Withdraws the given amount of tokens from the underlying money market and transfers them to `recipient`.
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation: @dev Withdraws all the tokens from the underlying money market and transfers them to `recipient`.
nodes.name: withdrawAll

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the supply for the given token, including accrued interest. This function can have side effects.
nodes.name: getSupply

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the supply for the given token; it might not include accrued interest. This function *cannot* have side effects.
nodes.name: getSupplyView

nodes.documentation: @dev Indicates if the adapter supports the token with the given address.
nodes.name: supportsToken

devdoc.details: Interface used by `MetaMoneyMarket` to interact with its underlying money markets.

deposit(address,uint256).details: Deposits the given amount of tokens in the underlying money market.

getRate(address).details: Returns the interest rate per block for the given token.

getSupply(address).details: Returns the supply for the given token, including accrued interest. This function can have side effects.

getSupplyView(address).details: Returns the supply for the given token; it might not include accrued interest. This function *cannot* have side effects.

supportsToken(address).details: Indicates if the adapter supports the token with the given address.

withdraw(address,address,uint256).details: Withdraws the given amount of tokens from the underlying money market and transfers them to `recipient`.

withdrawAll(address,address).details: Withdraws all the tokens from the underlying money market and transfers them to `recipient`.

devdoc.title: IMoneyMarketAdapter
